maintainers.errorLoading: Maintainers could not be loaded. Please try again later.
maintainers.addBucketMaintainersDescription: Maintainer can manage the bucket by adding courses and the corresponding course maintainers. There is a maximum of 10 maintainers per bucket.
maintainers.addCourseMaintainersDescription: Maintainer can manage the course by adding and deleting course content. They can also delete the course. There is a maximum of 20 maintainers by course.
maintainers.removeBucketMaintainersDescription: Maintainers can only be removed by the bucket owner.
maintainers.removeCourseMaintainersDescription: Course maintainers can only be removed by bucket maintainers.
